recipesJson.name: Strawberry lemon cookie bars
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: Well this is a recipe that kind of built itself. I got lemon cookie super concentrate from real flavors and wanted to make a recipe that is built around the lemon cookie. Well after a little research I came up with the perfect recipe to help make lemon cookie sc  shine. It blends very nicely it is good after one day but its at it's best after 4 days. It has a lot of flavors in this recipe but  the ends justify the means. In other words this recipe tastes so good it is worth using all the flavors  as listed in the recipe trust and believe you won't be disappointed.
